title: The Best American Erotica 1993
description: From Simon & Schuster, The Best American Erotica of 1993 is Susie Bright's collection featuring 20 short stories and excerpts from writers such as Anne Rice, Robert Silverberg, and others.This wide-ranging collection of the best of the past year's erotic literature is a sensual, explicit, imaginative, and—at times—surprisingly humorous look at the diversity of human sexuality.
author: Susie Bright
